Summary: Odd, still form in sky - agree with other Arlington witness
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw the other Arlington, Tx report and around the same time on the same day I also saw a stationary, glowing object in the sky. Told husband that I thought it was a UFO - have never seen anything like that - still yet high in the sky. There were no clouds in the sky and I thought it might be a tiny bit of cloud at first until I looked closer and saw it to be still and a strange color. It appeared to be coppery glow like to me. He didn't even look as he was driving and didn't believe me anyway. It unnerved me and I thought about it tonight and checked Mufon to see if anyone else saw the same thing as me. Pleased to see that I wasn't the only one to see it.
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Arlington
There was one other sighting in Arlington on or around January 27th 2012
